name: Where
value: Somewhere near the Cotswolds in England, United Kingdom

name: Who
value: Long span bridge engineer, who works for a global consultancy that designs infrastructure including roads, bridges, railways, wind farms, solar energy, hydrogen economy amongst other things.

name: Interests
value: Politics, decarbonisation, climate crisis, engineering of all types, charities and STEM Ambassadors [and railways, I almost forgot railways]
